Siege of Toulon 1793

Napoleon Bonaparte and the Revolution battle at Toulon with the Kingdom of Spain, Great Britain and many other kingdoms on the other side.

VIEW LIVE DEMO

Siege of Toulon is hosted on Google's

I was swooning after watching Napoleon's First Victory: Siege of Toulon 1793 on youtube. I wanted to build an web application just like it, so i did. This application isn't a finished product just yet, I hate that i didn't inject real d3.js data i had to use photos only because of the data visualizations structures I like was only available for the Angular framework, so in this app is photos of d3.ngx-chartsBut I could have used a charts framework in React which is plenty of them but I didn't feel the selection was right for this app. But react-scroll-parallax library made that active cannon shot possible and the quotes that move as you scroll look awesome.

The Siege of Toulon App is cobbled together with inspiration from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DRUx61plsz4 + https://www.amazon.com/Toulon-1793-Napoleons-victory-Campaign/dp/1841769193/ref=sr_1_1?tag=epichistorytv-20&ie=UTF8&qid=1522332900&sr=8-1&keywords=osprey+toulon.
